results.title: Live Laugh Love, Metal Art, Word Art, Wall Decor, Valentines, Modern
results.description:
Metal "Live Laugh Love", Metal Art, Word Art, Wall Decor, Valentines, Modern
Pictured is Galvanneal painted white

Made in the USA

***NEED A CUSTOM SIGN?   Just send us a message and we can get you a quote.

***IS IT A GIFT?    Leave a note at checkout and we will include it on a card-stock slip with shipment.

Choose a metal:
Stainless steel – Stainless steel provides a modern, clean look.  Our stainless is a #4 brushed finish which is easy to clean and/or polish with any retail stainless cleaner.  It will be less likely to rust and has a shinier finish than the other metals.  Stainless steel is not magnetic.  This is typically the most expensive metal.
Steel – Raw unfinished steel will rust very quickly.  You can apply a protective clear coat or a paint which will prevent this but does not guarantee it will not start to show signs of rust over time. If this is the look you are going for it is a great product and the least expensive of the metals. Steel is magnetic.
Galvanized – Galvanized metal has gone through a process of applying a protective coating to steel.  The coating is made from zinc and is used to halt the formation of rust.  It provides a long-lasting protection for steel products.  It also causes the metal to have a more silver finish than steel and it will typically have a distinctive “spangle” pattern on the finish.  It is slightly more expensive than the raw steel and it is magnetic.
Galvannealed – Galvannealed steel is metal that has gone through the process of galvanizing followed by annealing the sheet steel.   It is a matte uniform grey color, which can easily be painted. This metal can be used as is and will typically not show rust for a very long time, but primarily this metal would be the best choice if you are planning to paint or powder-coat your item.  It is also magnetic.  Occasionally we provide already painted items and they will be galvannealed material.
With all of our metals we try to use the best thickness to combine for sturdiness but light enough to easily mount with double sided self-adhesive tape.  Of course they can also be hung on nails or screws and if you would like us to add an extra mounting hole or two please add specific instruction in the notes with your order.
*Note* -  All metal can have slight scuffs or light scratches, that is just the nature of metals, it tends to make each item unique.

This Live, Laugh, Love quote sign  is custom made with a CNC plasma cutter out of 14 gauge steel and measures approximately 35 x 22”.  The piece comes painted flat black or copper.

 Comes finished with holes and nails for hanging. 

 Approx. 1 lb.

This word art sign is a great addition to any wall in your home or add it to a photo wall. Get one for yourself or give as a gift.

SHIPPING POLICY

-Usually ships in 5-10 business days.
 -All items are inspected before shipping to ensure they are in the best quality condition.
 - -We combine for shipping whenever possible for physical addresses. We reserve the right to ship via different shipping carriers. We typically choose the most reliable and/or cost efficient carrier.
 -We insure all our packages.
 -If an insured item (or items) is damaged by USPS or another shipping company, it will be the buyer's responsibility to claim damages to the shipping company and obtain a refund directly from the shipping company.
 -If you need to return an item due to a manufacturing defect, the real shipping costs will be deducted from your payment and you will receive a refund for the item price or an exchange.
 -It is the buyer's responsibility to pack return items properly and to acquire insurance on the package(s). If returns are received broken and uninsured, we will not issue any refund.

Decorate your home with MRC Wood Products' TimberPrintz line of wall signs. Each sign is professionally printed on Baltic birch wood and is made to look like rustic wood planks. These attractive signs combine modern materials and production methods to produce a beautiful and trendy end product.

***ABOUT THIS ITEM***
- This sign measures 6"x 18" and is 1/2" thick 
- Made from Baltic birch wood

results.title: Keep It Simple Sign with prim star Rustic Style Sign Distressed & Antiqued Great Office Gift Motivational
results.description:
"Keep It Simple"..This rustic sign is a great motivator!  Sometimes people are always trying to be so complicated, hang this sign, tell them Keep It Simple. To give this unique character, we added a small star above the letter i. 

This sign measures approximately 5.5 x 12 inches and is on 3/4 inch thick wood. This creation is shown in Barn Red/CountryTan.  Several other color options available in drop down selection. The first color will be the color of the text & second color will be the background.

• Shipment is generally 3 to 5 business days.
• Hanger attached on backside for easy hanging
• Hand painted laser engraved creation is made to order.
• If we are shipping directly as gift, we can enclose a small handwritten note card, be sure to let us know what you want the card to say in the note section.

• PROCESS Our handcrafted creations are made using a 7 step process to create a beautiful expression to be cherished for years to come. Two contrasting colors of paint are applied, the design is laser engraved, a fine hairline is applied to the design which gives an awesome touch. The final touches are completed once it goes through our antiquing process with edges distressed.

• COLOR We have a variety of color choices, but if you don't see what you are looking for, please ask  & we will see if we can make it happen for you. Keep in mind when selecting the color options, the first color is the text color, while the second color is the background. See policies for additional questions/clarification on colors.

• Please note these signs are not massed produced but each is unique and no two are exactly the same.

• When working with wood and the antiquing process, each sign has its own warmth and charm. While we try to get the best wood at the lumber yard, sometimes there will be knots or other slight imperfections in the wood, this is considered adding character to the rustic style of this line of our signs. Thanks for stopping by our shop and please do not hesitate to ask any questions.

Be sure to check out our other signs. https://www.etsy.com/shop/ExpressionsNmore?ref=hdr_shop_menu

Color Samples can be seen in a variety of sizes at  https://www.expressionsnmore.com/color-examples-rustic-laser-engraved/

results.description:
This Cute LIVE LAUGH LOVE print Dainty Hair Bow is perfect for your baby girl for any outfit.
 
Measures 2" wide, this Dainty Hair Bow with soft and stretchy matching Shock Pink Lace Headband is perfect for Newborns, babies three months to 12 months and 18+ month old babies to toddlers.
   
Please Note: A No-Slip Alligator Clip is a strip added to the inside of the Alligator Clip to help prevent the clip from slipping in fine hair.

An Alligator Clip is a clip that opens like an alligators mouth.

A French Barrette is a metal clasping barrette.

A Pony-O is a wrapped ponytail holder.

A Clip + Band is the Hair Bow attached to an Alligator Clip and includes an Interchangeable Headband.

New Hand Made Condition. Only quality Ribbon Used. 
I heat seal "ALL" the ends to prevent fraying. 
I pay attention to every little detail, you won't be disappointed! 
**Smoke Free Home** 

I'm happy to do Custom Orders, please contact me 
if you need a special Hair Bow, Headband, Clippie or Flower Bow.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Chalkboard Quote Art Print - 8x10
results.description:
HANDMADE IN THE USA
I create and package every piece of art myself to ensure the highest quality possible for every print I sell. That means all the magic happens right here in North Carolina, USA! 

THE FINEST MATERIALS 
All fine art prints are created with high-performance matte paper. Then a subtle and elegant linen texture is embossed onto the surface. The result adds just the right level of texture to your images without interfering with details. 
THE PERFECT (EASY!) GIFT 
Each of my art prints is packaged with care and an artistic eye, so that it can be delivered straight to a lucky recipient who will be super impressed by its crafty, handmade charm! This is high-quality packaging that will not only WOW you, but also protect your art from any possible damage or bending in transit :-D

SO MANY MORE TO CHOOSE FROM! 
This print is just one of many I offer! Check out the HUNDREDS of other prints and sets available by clicking the "Categories" tab in the menu at the top of this page, and browse my wide variety - there's something for everyone!

results.title: Live Well Laugh Often Love Much | Live | Laugh | Love | Wood sign | kitchen sign | dining sign | entry sign | Style HM18
results.description:
Shown here on a Black sign board with White lettering.

Sign measures approximately 5 1/2" tall x 24" wide x 3/4" thick.

Please choose your sign colors using the drop down boxes, if you are unable to select your colors from the drop down boxes please include your choices in the notes to seller section as well. For current color options please view the additional listing pictures

Signs are intended for indoor use

Sign boards are painted or stained and have sanded edges for a slightly distressed look, all lettering is hand painted using custom made stencils, brush strokes may be visible as well as slight imperfections and differences making each sign one of a kind.   Signs come ready to hang with a saw tooth hanger on the back. 

Items may slightly vary in color, I try my best to accurately depict colors in my photos and color charts however all computer monitors can vary and the colors seen on your monitor may vary slightly from the actual item color.

Signs are made using standard pine boards, and due to the natural qualities of the wood each sign is unique in appearance and you can expect for there to be knots, slight cracks, imperfections, rough spots, etc in the wood and coloring in the finished product.  

Current production time:  Please allow up to 2 weeks for your sign to be made and shipped, signs are not made until ordered.  I make every effort to complete signs and ship orders out as quickly as possible.  

I ship all signs via USPS Priority Mail; delivery is typically 2-3 days once shipped. Once shipped you will receive a notification that your package is on its way along with the USPS Tracking #. Your package will be shipped to the address on your Etsy receipt unless otherwise noted.

If you need something sooner than the above current production time please contact me BEFORE PURCHASING to see if I accommodate your time frame.

Customer satisfaction is important to us so if there is an issue with your order or if for any reason you are unhappy with your sign purchase please contact me before leaving negative feedback so that I can resolve the issue.

Thank you for visiting Signs by Jen and please contact me with any questions!!
